headline: Coinbase considers applying for federal bank charter
summary: Regulatory willingness to work with crypto seems to have inspired Coinbase, and reportedly others, to engrain themselves deeper into the traditional financial sector.

raw.headline: Coinbase considers applying for federal bank charter
raw.summary: Regulatory willingness to work with crypto seems to have inspired Coinbase, and reportedly others, to engrain themselves deeper into the traditional financial sector.

headline: GE Vernova & AT&T outlook, bitcoin & crypto gains: Trending Tickers
summary: Brad Smith and Madison Mills take a closer look at some of the trending tickers of today's trading session on Wealth. GE Vernova (GEV) maintains its full-year outlook despite a $300–$400 million impact from tariffs. AT&T (T) also reaffirmed its guidance as subscriber numbers grew, supporting the company's assertion that it is well-positioned amid economic uncertainty. Bitcoin (BTC-USD) is trading above $90,000, lifting other crypto-related stocks like Coinbase (COIN), Strategy (MSTR), MARA (MARA), and Robinhood (HOOD). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here.

headline: Bitcoin Price Rises Above $94,000
summary: Investor relief about a possible easing of U.S.-China trade tensions is extending to cryptocurrencies.  Bitcoin recently traded above $94,000, its highest level since early March, after climbing back above $90,000 Tuesday.

raw.headline: Bitcoin Price Rises Above $94,000
raw.summary: Investor relief about a possible easing of U.S.-China trade tensions is extending to cryptocurrencies.  Bitcoin recently traded above $94,000, its highest level since early March, after climbing back above $90,000 Tuesday.

headline: Riot Platforms Secures $100M Bitcoin-Backed Credit Line From Coinbase
summary: The funds will be used for strategic initiatives and general corporate purposes, and cash drawn from the line will carry at least a 7.75% interest rate.

raw.headline: Riot Platforms Secures $100M Bitcoin-Backed Credit Line From Coinbase
raw.summary: The funds will be used for strategic initiatives and general corporate purposes, and cash drawn from the line will carry at least a 7.75% interest rate.

headline: Coinbase started at ‘buy’ by Benchmark amid increasing adoption
summary: Investing.com -- Benchmark initiated coverage of Coinbase Global (NASDAQ:COIN) Inc with a Buy rating and $252 price target saying the company has a leading U.S. market position. It also noted potential upside from a “soon-to-improve environment for crypto” driven by regulatory clarity and institutional demand.

headline: Endor Labs Raises $93M Series B to Secure the AI Code Revolution
summary: Endor Labs, the fastest-growing company in application security, today announced its oversubscribed $93 million Series B funding round led by DFJ Growth, with participation from Salesforce Ventures and existing backers including Lightspeed Venture Partners, Coatue, Dell Technologies Capital, Section 32, and Citi Ventures.
